All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
A class that is used to send account objects from the client to the server and database and back.
AccountClient
An interface that is used to interact with the server from the model using client classes.
AccountClientCallBack
An interface that is used as a call back to the client for updates in table
AccountClientImpl
A class that logins the account and can also create account.
AccountHandler
Interface that lets server interact with database for the client account
AccountHandlerImpl
A class that implements account handler interface and handles account objects.
AccountImpl
A class that handles creating and logging in account.
AccountModel
An interface that is used to interact from the gui with the model.
AccountServer
An interface that extends remote.

A class that implements account server interface.

A class that interacts with the database account table.
